name: Car Scamper
description:
Car Scamper is a racing game in which three types of racing categories are there, like
1. Against time
2. Against Car
3. Against obstacles

# How to Play :-
* In Each Game User has to move the car with acceleration.

* Against Time: In this level user has to complete one lap in 30 sec. User can collect fuel jars on the road while travelling. According to user travelling distance score will add.
* Against obstacle: User Has to collect all the obstacles which are present on the road within the given time. Boards also present on the road avoid boards. If you touch the boards score will decrease to 5 and penalty will add to 1. If you complete all the obstacles you will get 500 points extra.
* Against Car: Another two cars moving along with user car. User has to complete 4 laps in 2 sec before other cars. Other cars are moving automatically. If user car touches other car that other car will stop for some time. Score will add according to number laps completed. If user complete 4 laps in 2 sec you will get 500 points extra.
* Make a high score and post on Game center.
